Product.Name: White ankle zip crop
Product.Description:
We designed this crisp, white jean in our sleekest silhouette and cropped length for a leg-elongating look. Ankle zippers add the finishing touch.
  • 99% Cotton, 1% Spandex.
  • Machine wash cold.
  • Imported.

Product.Name: White denim trouser
